name: Sonic Unleashed
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog is on an adventure unlike any other! Powered by an all-new engine, Sonic Unleashed™ merges classic Sonic gameplay with the latest in next-generation innovation. Merging blistering 2D action with meticulously rendered 3D environments, players race through intriguing locations across the globe as Sonic to save a chaotic world.
On a quest for domination once more, Dr. Eggman unleashes a slumbering beast from the center of
the world. The event causes a devastating tremor that splinters the world into seven continents and
triggers a hair-raising transformation in Sonic. With the world divided and Sonic altered with new
abilities and powers, the stage is set for a climactic battle… for when the sun sets, a whole new
adventure awakens!
1 player
1MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p
